name: The Dust Harvest
description:
As Space Whales you crave Dust, it is in your blood and under your skin. To get more of it you made the Dust Monkeys, they carve up planets and send it all out. Simple no?

But things go wrong and now they carve you up, they crave the dust under your skin!

**To Harvest or to be Harvested?**

---

* Fire: Left Mouse

* Jump: Tab or Space

* Boosts: Q/1 and E/2

* Movement: WASD or Arrows

**That is the Life and Death questions!**

---
